app.controllers

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.controllers.BaseController
      • app.controllers.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends BaseController
    Main controller that handle main.fxml events.
    Author:
    Petr Křehlík, Martin Klobušický

      • drawMap

        public void drawMap(org.json.simple.JSONObject map)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
        Draw full map.
        Parameters:
        map - JSON map data source.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When JSON data file doesn't exist.
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - When JSON data file is in bad format.
